name: The Block (itch) (Testament)
description:
Introduction:

This is a short game (about 20 minutes) made for the RPG2S Cursed Contest #1 (2022) (First place, yay!).  Obviously there was the whole month of October to deliver, but the idea came to me 10 days before the deadline...

History:

A developer falls prey to one of the most terrible curses: creative block! He has a deadline to honor (it reminds me of something...), but zero ideas on what to do and how to do it... and there's only one week left!

Help him overcome this curse day by day, to rekindle the flame of creativity and get the job done... or he will succumb to the curse.

Technical Features/Gameplay:

The game is made entirely from scratch by yours truly, graphically speaking, and consists of a series of timed mini-games of dexterity, rhythm and resistance which, if overcome, will take your project a little further in development. 3 possible assessments: Poor (10%), Sufficient (15%), Excellent (20%).  Will you reach 100% within 7 days?

How relatable...

The deadline is approaching!! SEVEN DAYS!


Transform negative feelings into positive energy!


Complete the projeeeeect!!!11!!

Don't get lost in bullshit and procrastination!!
